description:
Natsusa`s depression gets blown away when Seiichirou suddenly tells him to stop coming to matches. The two of them begin to fight and Ibuki decides to take things into his own hands. It seems Seiichirou needs time to think about why he plays rugby.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Mokuhyou to Shudan wa Tochuu de Goccha ni Nari Gachi
The Goal and Method Often Gets Muddled in the Process.
目標と手段は途中でごっちゃになりがち
